mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update board set title= #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from board where bno > 0
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt = viewcnt+1 where bno = #{bno}
